DOC.brief_summary: An open label , bioequivalence study sumatriptan succinate 100 mg tablet ( contain 140 mg sumatriptan succinate equivalent 100 mg sumatriptan ) fasting Conditions
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence Study Sumatriptan 100mg Tablets Under Fasting Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: The study conduct open-label , balance , randomize , two-treatment , two-period , two-sequence , single-dose , crossover , bioequivalence study compare Sumatriptan Succinate Tablets 100 mg ( contain sumatriptan succinate equivalent 100 mg sumatriptan ) manufacture OHM Laboratories Inc. IMITREXÂ® tablets 100 mg ( contain sumatriptan succinate equivalent 100 mg sumatriptan ) manufacture GlaxoSmithkline Research Triangle Park , NC 27709 , Made Canada healthy , adult , male , human subject fast condition . Following overnight fast least 10 hour , single oral dose sumatriptan succinate tablet 100 mg ( contain 140 mg sumatriptan succinate equivalent 100 mg sumatriptan ) either test reference formulation administer period study , along 240 mL drink water ambient temperature low light condition supervision train study personnel . 32 subject enrol study . However , twenty seven ( 27 ) subject complete period study . Pharmacokinetic Statistical analysis perform twenty seven subject ( 27 ) subject .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Were age range 1845 year . 2 . Were neither overweight underweight height per Life Insurance Corporation India height/weight chart nonmedical case . 3 . Had voluntarily give write informed consent participate study . 4 . Were normal health determine medical history physical examination subject perform within 21 day prior commencement study . 1 . Had history know hypersensitivity Sumatriptan relate group drug drug . 2 . Had history intermittent chest pain chest tightness might might require medication relief . 3 . Had history peripheral vascular disease ( cramp , tiredness severe pain walk relatively short distance persist rest , noticeable change color ( blueness paleness ) temperature ( coolness ) compare limb ) . 4 . Had history headache , vertigo , dizziness without nausea vomiting . 5 . Had history intermittent loss vision . 6 . Had history seizure head injury . 7 . Had evidence organ dysfunction clinically significant deviation normal , physical clinical determination . 8 . Presence disease marker HIV 1 2 , Hepatitis B C viruses syphilis infection . 9 . Presence value significantly different normal reference range and/or judge clinically significant hemoglobin , total white blood cell count , differential WBC count platelet count . 10 . Positive urinary screen test drug abuse ( opiates cannabinoids ) . 11 . Presence value significantly different normal reference range and/or judge clinically significant serum creatinine , blood urea nitrogen , serum aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) , serum alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) , serum alkaline phosphatase , serum bilirubin , plasma glucose serum cholesterol . 12 . Had clinically abnormal chemical microscopic examination urine define presence RBC , WBC ( > 4/HPF ) , glucose ( positive ) protein ( positive ) . 13 . Had clinically abnormal ECG Chest Xray . 14 . Had history serious gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , cardiovascular , pulmonary , neurological haematological disease , diabetes glaucoma headinjury coma . 15 . Had history psychiatric illness might impair ability provide write informed consent . 16 . Regular smoker smoke 10 cigarette daily difficulty abstain smoke duration study period . 17 . Had history drug dependence excessive alcohol intake habitual basis 2 unit alcoholic beverage per day ( 1 unit equivalent half pint beer 1 glass wine 1 measure spirit ) difficulty abstain duration study period . 18 . Used enzyme modify drug within 30 day prior Day 1 study . 19 . Participation clinical trial within 12 week precede Day 1 study . 20 . Subjects , completion study , would donate and/or lose 350 mL blood past 3 month .
